attributes.action: Call for an urgent General Election.
attributes.additional_details: There is an obvious lack of confidence and trust in the current prime minister and his government, who have already failed to deliver many of the promises they made to the voting public. An urgent general election is required.
attributes.background: There is an urgent need for a General Election due to the lack of confidence in the current government by the majority of the UK people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
